name: Zombie Survival (luke1235)
description:
A  simple top-down zombie shooter with a selection of weapons and special zombies. Protect the base and keep yourself alive.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • R - Reload
  • Number keys 1 to 6 - Change weapon
  • Scroll up/down - Previous/next weapon
  • Tab - Shop
  • Esc - Pause
  • F4 - Toggle fullscreen
